185991155.review: this game is like if counter-strike source and team fortress 2 had a war themed baby that never got updated, personally id recommend counter-strike source and team fortress 2 much more than this but if you're wanting to try something a little bit different then this works. it's objective focused so a lot of it centers around capturing points and such. but the focus on recoil and advanced gun mechanics and realism really draws from counter-strike.

185960660.review: A interesting WW2 game,I like it

185959772.review:
Cosas buenas que tiene el juego:
-Es adictivo
-Puedes jugar con los buenos
-Similar al Team Fortress 2
-Immersivo a pesar de ser bastante simple

Cosas Malas:
-Las clases no tienen variedad de diseño cada una es el mismo modelos en los 2 equipos , deberían añadir un modelo de almirante por ejemplo.
-A veces el juego no detecta las hitbox y no te cuenta el disparo o las animaciones muestran que te mataron cuando ni te estaban mirando pero por suerte no pasa tanto.
-Los mods no funcionan.
-La mayoría de servidores meten cosas innecesarias que estorban y que no me interesan para nada como la baja gravedad , el que puedas elegir armas que no son de tu clase en un menú numérico que te aparece en la parte izquierda , que cambien de mapa sin haber terminado la partida etc

Cosas a mejorar:
Deberían añadir un poco más de contenido porque se siente una beta más que un juego por ejemplo un equipo soviético o Italiano, Gallinas como en el CSGO etc

En resumen el juego está decente para echar un rato pero está lejos de ser un juegazo , eso si te deja jugar como los alemanes y pocos juegos te permiten esto.
6/10

185860938.review:
This is a kind of game youd only hear about if you have enough interest in source engine games to look deeper. A hidden gem for sure. If you're on the fence about getting this game, think of it as a fusion of counter strike and team fortress. the TF part is that you can play as different classes that fill a certain role and you are working with your teammates to complete an objective. the CS part is in the little touches of realism, and that you can pick up dropped weapons, even ones that your class doesnt have.

I highly recommend this game to anyone with an interest in source engine games or valve stuff in general.

Give me a Karabiner 98 any day, very satisfying. Just a shame they decided to remove the British Army from DoD, though I dare say you can get a mod for that *yawn* ...anyway, decent enough graphics, straight forward controls and interface shall we say, plays pretty slick in my opinion. Still pop on now and again and mostly get owned these days, but its still good fun and usually in my library ready to go ;-) los los los!

185526019.review: played this as a teenager and the game is everything I remember and more (now i actually understand how to play these games somewhat). Great nostalgia trip to a game that holds up amazingly well to today's standards with beautifully crafted maps showing off a range of new features added to the source engine at it's release. Realistic, immersive gameplay really capturing the essence of close to mid range combat in this era of ww2. surpressing fire from machine gunners, covering fire from SMGs/Light machine guns all play their part in helping the team advance. My favourite game released on the source engine without doubt, if you like CSS and similar games this is even better and guaranteed enjoyment

185413060.review:
Я хочу поделиться своими впечатлениями от Day of Defeat: Source. Эта игра действительно запомнилась мне благодаря своему уникальному стилю и атмосфере Второй мировой войны.

Геймплей:
Сражения в игре всегда напряженные и полны адреналина. Каждая карта предоставляет свои собственные тактические возможности, и благодаря разнообразию классов, каждый игрок может найти свою роль в команде. Это меня очень впечатлило, так как хорошая командная работа действительно решает исход боя.

По графике и физике:
Я бы сказал, что графика в игре выглядит отлично, особенно для своего времени. Физика объектов также добавляет больше реализма — чувствуешь, что каждое действие имеет свои последствия.

Сложности:
Однако не обошлось и без недостатков. Иногда в игре бывают проблемы с балансом и управлением, что приводит к некоторым неприятным моментам. Но это не сильно портит общее впечатление.

В итоге, если вы любите командные шутеры с насыщенным сюжетом и исторической тематикой, я рекомендую попробовать Day of Defeat: Source.

185284534.review:
Bizarre and unintuitive. As a long time fan of historical shooters Medal of Honor to Verdun, this is the first time a historical shooter has left me confused and disappointed.
As a new player I enter a very charming looking world with quite standar fare when it comes to team shooters with classes to choose from and objectives to seize. But after that it all falls apart.
The time to kill is very short, but players also move very quickly as if there is no friction on the ground. While this isn't a bad thing, it does not mesh well with the weapons provided. Automatic weapons are not optional, especially since the maps all feature very close range combat. This confounding design decision makes classes without automatic weapons useless, and players are greatly rewarded for side strafing and spraying.
In many ways this game feels like Counter Strike with a WW2 coat of paint, in which case I will just play Counter Strike instead. This style of gameplay does not mesh well with a WW2 setting and Day of Defeat fails as both a historical shooter and as a fun game.

184232046.review: 当我第一次知道要让我玩DOD:S的时候，其实我是拒绝的！因为我觉得……呀……你不能叫我玩，我就马上玩，第一，我要试玩一下，我又不想说……你玩完一个游戏以后加了很多特技，那美军啊，那德军啊……咣~~~~~很帅！打得很准！很牛b！结果同学们一定骂我，根本没有这种游戏！这证明上面那个是假的……我说先要给我试玩一下。后来我经过也知道它是V社的，而且没有那种无脑突突突的成分。那……玩了这个月……这个月下来之后呢……起码我玩了很舒服。现在呢……每天还在玩！.....我还给了我基友玩！来！来！来！大家试试看！那我跟导演讲∶"玩的时候就拍！拍完之后，这个游戏就是我玩的游戏，就不要再加特技上去，就是这样子！我要给观众看到，我玩的时候是这样子，你们玩的时候，也是这样子！"
